description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Loaded Wedges recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Egg free,Mar 2020,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dairy free,Beetroot
name: Vegan Loaded Wedges Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the creamy cashew & herb sauce, place cashews in a medium heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and soak for 30 minutes.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 220Â°C and line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Scrub vegetables, cut into long, 2cm-thick wedges and toss in a bowl with 2 tbs oil. Season well. Spread vegetables in a single layer on trays. Bake, turning halfway, for 35 minutes or until evenly roasted.
Mix breadcrumbs with remaining oil. Sprinkle over vegetables and bake for a further 5 minutes or until crumbs are golden and crisp.
Drain cashews and process in a small food processor with herbs, lemon juice, garlic and 1/2 cup cold water until smooth and bright green.
Drizzle herb sauce and Sriracha over wedges, garnish with extra mint, and serve.
